20110129020036.000|20110129020037.000|CC1|SHAH, IRAN'S MONARCHY.

20110129020045.000|20110129020046.000|CC1|DISGUST WITH WHAT WAS SUPPOSED

20110129020048.000|20110129020050.000|CC1|IRAN LED TO A WHOLE NEW UPRISING

20110129020540.000|20110129020540.000|CC1|AS WELL.

20110129020603.000|20110129020606.000|CC1|HE WOULD ACTUALLY APPEAR, THE

20110129020607.000|20110129020609.000|CC1|THE RAMBLING NATURE OF HIS

20110129020615.000|20110129020617.000|CC1|THAT HE WAS NOT PLANNING ON

20110129020619.000|20110129020620.000|CC1|MODERN POLITICAL HISTORY.       
20110129020620.000|20110129020622.000|CC1|HE REFUSED TO STEP DOWN HIMSELF 
20110129020622.000|20110129020623.000|CC1|AS PROTESTERS HAVE DEMANDED.

20110129020625.000|20110129020633.000|CC1|FIRE THE REST OF HIS GOVERNMENT.
20110129020633.000|20110129020634.000|CC1|>> Translator: I HAVE REQUESTED 
20110129020634.000|20110129020635.000|CC1|THE GOVERNMENT TO STEP DOWN     
20110129020635.000|20110129020639.000|CC1|TODAY, AND I WILL DESIGNATE A   
20110129020639.000|20110129020642.000|CC1|NEW GOVERNMENT, A NEW GOVERNMENT
20110129020642.000|20110129020644.000|CC1|AS OF TOMORROW TO SHOULDER NEW  
20110129020644.000|20110129020647.000|CC1|DUTIES AND TO ACCOUNT FOR THE   
20110129020647.000|20110129020650.000|CC1|PRIORITIES OF THE UPCOMING ERA.

20110129020652.000|20110129020653.000|CC1|JEERS.

20110129020659.000|20110129020701.000|CC1|MUBARAK'S SPEECH ENDED, THE     
20110129020701.000|20110129020703.000|CC1|PROTESTS IN THE STREETS STARTED

20110129020703.000|20110129020706.000|CC1|IN THE SQUARE, IN LIBERATION    
20110129020706.000|20110129020708.000|CC1|SQUARE, THAT EARLIER GOOD WILL  
20110129020708.000|20110129020710.000|CC1|TO THE ARMY THAT I DESCRIBED    
20110129020710.000|20110129020712.000|CC1|SEEMED TO BE ENDING AS SOLDIERS 
20110129020712.000|20110129020713.000|CC1|AND PROTESTERS CLASHED IN THE   
20110129020713.000|20110129020713.000|CC1|STREETS.                        
20110129020713.000|20110129020715.000|CC1|ABOUT AN HOUR AFTER EGYPT'S     
20110129020715.000|20110129020716.000|CC1|PRESIDENT SPOKE UP, AMERICA'S   
20110129020716.000|20110129020719.000|CC1|PRESIDENT DID AS WELL.          
20110129020719.000|20110129020721.000|CC1|>> WHAT'S NEEDED RIGHT NOW ARE  
20110129020721.000|20110129020723.000|CC1|CONCRETE STEPS THAT ADVANCE THE 
20110129020723.000|20110129020725.000|CC1|RIGHTS OF THE EGYPTIAN PEOPLE, A
20110129020725.000|20110129020726.000|CC1|MEANINGFUL DIALOGUE BETWEEN THE 
20110129020726.000|20110129020728.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT AND ITS CITIZENS AND 
20110129020728.000|20110129020730.000|CC1|A PATH OF POLITICAL CHANGE THAT 
20110129020730.000|20110129020732.000|CC1|LEADS TO A FUTURE OF GREATER    
20110129020732.000|20110129020735.000|CC1|FREEDOM AND GREATER OPPORTUNITY 
20110129020735.000|20110129020737.000|CC1|AND JUSTICE FOR THE EGYPTIAN    
20110129020737.000|20110129020738.000|CC1|PEOPLE.                         
20110129020738.000|20110129020740.000|CC1|>> IN 1979, IRAN'S ISLAMIC      
20110129020740.000|20110129020742.000|CC1|REVOLUTION TOPPLED THE SHAH.    
20110129020742.000|20110129020744.000|CC1|THAT REVOLUTION REPLACED THIS   
20110129020744.000|20110129020747.000|CC1|GUY, WITH THIS GUY, AND THAT    
20110129020747.000|20110129020749.000|CC1|ULTIMATELY BROUGHT US THIS GUY, 
20110129020749.000|20110129020750.000|CC1|WIDELY THOUGHT OF AS BOTH A TIN 
20110129020750.000|20110129020752.000|CC1|POT AND A CRACKPOT, I'M NOT     
20110129020752.000|20110129020753.000|CC1|AFRAID TO SAY.                  
20110129020753.000|20110129020755.000|CC1|THERE IS NOT ONE PATH FORWARD OR
20110129020755.000|20110129020756.000|CC1|ONE PATH BACKWARD.              
20110129020756.000|20110129020758.000|CC1|THE MUSLIM WORLD, EVEN JUST THE 
20110129020758.000|20110129020800.000|CC1|ARAB MUSLIM WORLD IS A VERY BIG,
20110129020800.000|20110129020802.000|CC1|VERY COMPLICATED PLACE, WITH    
20110129020802.000|20110129020803.000|CC1|LOTS OF DIFFERENT FACTIONS AND

20110129021601.000|20110129021601.000|CC1|DEMONSTRATORS.                  
20110129021601.000|20110129021603.000|CC1|NOW, MUBARAK COULD RE-SHUFFLE   
20110129021603.000|20110129021605.000|CC1|HIS CABINET TO MAKE HIS POSITION
20110129021605.000|20110129021605.000|CC1|STRONGER.                       
20110129021605.000|20110129021608.000|CC1|HE SAYS HE'S GOING TO RE-SHUFFLE
20110129021608.000|20110129021610.000|CC1|IT IN ORDER TO INCREASE REFORMS.
20110129021610.000|20110129021613.000|CC1|THERE'S BEEN MANY RE-SHUFFLINGS 
20110129021613.000|20110129021614.000|CC1|OF THE EGYPTIAN CABINET IN THE  
20110129021614.000|20110129021614.000|CC1|PAST.

20110129021739.000|20110129021741.000|CC1|HE HAS TWO KIDS, 40 YEARS OLD.

20110129022020.000|20110129022022.000|CC1|>> RICHARD, LET ME JUST ASK YOU

20110129022111.000|20110129022112.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IT FEELS INCREDIBLY
20110129022112.000|20110129022113.000|CC1|SIGNIFICANT.                    
20110129022113.000|20110129022115.000|CC1|IT'S BEEN SOMETHING THAT I'VE   
20110129022115.000|20110129022116.000|CC1|BEEN THINKING ABOUT ALL DAY     
20110129022116.000|20110129022116.000|CC1|REALLY.                         
20110129022116.000|20110129022118.000|CC1|I LIVED HERE RIGHT AFTER I NEVER
20110129022118.000|20110129022120.000|CC1|SPOKE TO YOU IN COLLEGE, AND I  
20110129022120.000|20110129022122.000|CC1|CAME HERE AND LIVED ON VERY     
20110129022122.000|20110129022123.000|CC1|LITTLE MONEY, SPENDING MOST OF  
20110129022123.000|20110129022125.000|CC1|MY TIME WEEPING THAT YOU        
20110129022125.000|20110129022127.000|CC1|WOULDN'T TALK TO ME, AND I WAS  
20110129022127.000|20110129022129.000|CC1|LIVING IN A VERY POOR           
20110129022129.000|20110129022131.000|CC1|NEIGHBORHOOD HERE, AND THERE WAS
20110129022131.000|20110129022133.000|CC1|A SENSE OF SOLIDARITY AND       
20110129022133.000|20110129022134.000|CC1|COMMUNITY AT THE TIME.          
20110129022134.000|20110129022136.000|CC1|PEOPLE WERE -- WERE POOR, BUT   
20110129022136.000|20110129022139.000|CC1|PRETTY MUCH EVERYONE WAS POOR AT
20110129022139.000|20110129022141.000|CC1|THE TIME, AND THERE WASN'T THIS 
20110129022141.000|20110129022142.000|CC1|KIND OF FRUSTRATION THAT -- THAT
20110129022142.000|20110129022143.000|CC1|YOU FEEL NOW.                   
20110129022143.000|20110129022145.000|CC1|THERE WAS A -- ALMOST AN HONOR  
20110129022145.000|20110129022148.000|CC1|IN POVERTY HERE, AND PEOPLE     
20110129022148.000|20110129022149.000|CC1|STILL WORKED IN SMALL FACTORIES.
20110129022149.000|20110129022152.000|CC1|THERE WAS A LOT PRODUCED        
20110129022152.000|20110129022152.000|CC1|LOCALLY.                        
20110129022152.000|20110129022153.000|CC1|THE ECONOMY, AND REALLY THE     
20110129022153.000|20110129022156.000|CC1|WORLD ECONOMY, HAS CHANGED      
20110129022156.000|20110129022157.000|CC1|DRAMATICALLY SINCE THEN.        
20110129022157.000|20110129022159.000|CC1|THE GAP BETWEEN THE RICH AND THE
20110129022159.000|20110129022201.000|CC1|POOR HAS GROWN EXPONENTIALLY.   
20110129022201.000|20110129022203.000|CC1|THERE ARE NOW MULTI-MILLION     
20110129022203.000|20110129022205.000|CC1|DOLLAR HOMES JUST ON THE

20110129022207.000|20110129022209.000|CC1|SUBURBS OF CAIRO, AND PEOPLE    
20110129022209.000|20110129022212.000|CC1|HAVE GOTTEN MUCH, MUCH POORER.  
20110129022212.000|20110129022214.000|CC1|THEIR INFLATION HAS GONE UP     
20110129022214.000|20110129022215.000|CC1|DRAMATICALLY AND THE GOVERNMENT 
20110129022215.000|20110129022216.000|CC1|HAS NOT DONE VERY MUCH, AND THAT
20110129022216.000|20110129022218.000|CC1|IS WHAT'S PUSHING PEOPLE AND    
20110129022218.000|20110129022220.000|CC1|PUSHING PEOPLE FURTHER.         
20110129022220.000|20110129022221.000|CC1|AND I CAN UNDERSTAND THE        
20110129022221.000|20110129022223.000|CC1|CONCERNS THAT EGYPTIANS HAVE,   
20110129022223.000|20110129022225.000|CC1|BECAUSE THE PEOPLE ON THE       
20110129022225.000|20110129022226.000|CC1|STREET, THE PEOPLE WHO HAVE A   
20110129022226.000|20110129022229.000|CC1|VERY SIMILAR MENTALITY TO WHAT  
20110129022229.000|20110129022232.000|CC1|THEY HAD THEN, ARE NOT

20110129022233.000|20110129022234.000|CC1|THINK THEY ARE ASKING FOR.      
20110129022234.000|20110129022238.000|CC1|THEY ARE NOT ASKING FOR         
20110129022238.000|20110129022239.000|CC1|NECESSARILY A LIBERAL DEMOCRACY 
20110129022239.000|20110129022241.000|CC1|THAT IS GOING TO BE PRO-WESTERN.
20110129022241.000|20110129022244.000|CC1|WHAT THEY WANT IS STILL TO BE

20110129023634.000|20110129023638.000|CC1|    BREATHES EASILY.            
20110129023638.000|20110129023641.000|CC1|    IT FLOWS WITH CLEAN WATER.  
20110129023641.000|20110129023643.000|CC1|    IT MAKES ITS SKYLINE GREENER
20110129023643.000|20110129023643.000|CC1|        AND ITS                 
20110129023643.000|20110129023645.000|CC1|    POPULATION HEALTHIER.       
20110129023645.000|20110129023645.000|CC1|        ALL TO BECOME           
20110129023645.000|20110129023647.000|CC1|        THE KIND OF CITY        
20110129023647.000|20110129023647.000|CC1|        PEOPLE WANT

20110129024416.000|20110129024418.000|CC1|THAT'S THE RATIONALE BEHIND IT. 
20110129024418.000|20110129024420.000|CC1|SO I THINK THEY HAVE GOTTEN MUCH
20110129024420.000|20110129024422.000|CC1|MORE SOLID FOOTING, BUT I THINK

20110129024423.000|20110129024426.000|CC1|THAT IT'S REALLY HARD TO WEAN
